original_text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him, they sent out into all that country round about, and brought unto him all that were diseased;
korean_text: 그 곳 사람들이 예수이신 줄을 알고 그 근방에 두루 통지하여 모든 병든 자를 예수께 데리고 와서

sentences.original_text: And when men of that place had knowledge of him
they sent out into all that country round about
and brought unto him all that were diseased
